channel.title: Linear Programming on PINEAL.ME
channel.description: Recent content in Linear Programming on PINEAL.ME

item.title: Linear Programming
item.description: $$\matrix{A} \times \matrix{X} = \matrix{B} $$ Coeffienent matrix A => n * n, x vector of unknowns, B right hand side Linear system of equations. $$A \times X ≥ B$$ Objective function $$C^T \times X $$ linear Goal : Minimize the objective function E.g.: $$ \cases{x1 - x2 ≥ 0 \ x_1 ≥ 0 \ x_2 ≥ 0 \ x1 + x2 ≤ 4 }$$ Maximize $x1 + 2x_2$ ###Simplex method Only look at the vertex
